="preserve">"Please Mr. Postman" is the first single of The Marvelettes on the Motown record label. This was the first Motown song to reach #1 on the "Billboard" Hot 100 pop chart. The song was released in the summer of 1961.
The song was also recorded by The Carpenters in 1974. Their single also hit #1 on "Billboard" Hot 100.
